parameters.responseBody:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Webhook processed successfully",
  "timestamp": "{{ new Date().toISOString() }}",
  "event_type": "{{ $('Process Webhook Data').json.event }}",
  "user": "{{ $('Process Webhook Data').json.user }}",
  "api_response": "{{ $json }}",
  "processed": true,
  "workflow_id": "cursor-webhook-workflow"
}

{
  "success": false,
  "message": "API integration failed",
  "timestamp": "{{ new Date().toISOString() }}",
  "event_type": "{{ $('Process Webhook Data').json.event }}",
  "user": "{{ $('Process Webhook Data').json.user }}",
  "error": "{{ $json.error || 'Unknown error' }}",
  "processed": false,
  "workflow_id": "cursor-webhook-workflow"
}

{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Webhook processed successfully (no API call)",
  "timestamp": "{{ new Date().toISOString() }}",
  "event_type": "{{ $('Process Webhook Data').json.event }}",
  "user": "{{ $('Process Webhook Data').json.user }}",
  "processed": true,
  "workflow_id": "cursor-webhook-workflow"
}
